upcoming.title: Extra Life 2020
upcoming.description: Extra Life is a challenge where you livestream for 24 hours to raise money for your local Children Miracle Network hospital. This November will be our fourth year of participating in Extra Life! Help us reach our goal of raising $500 for Boston Children's Hospital!

previous.title: Extra Life 2019
previous.description: Extra Life is a challenge where you livestream for 24 hours to raise money for your local Children Miracle Network hospital. November 2, 2019 was our third year participating in Extra Life. This year, we invited more people to participate in the stream, making it easily our most fun year yet. We absolutely smashed our original goal of $200, raising a total of $1,169.10. Unfortunately, the VOD for this stream was lost, but we have lots of great clips!

previous.title: Extra Life 2018
previous.description: Extra Life is a challenge where you livestream for 24 hours to raise money for your local Children Miracle Network hospital. November 11, 2018 was our second time participating in Extra Life. We were able to meet our goal of $200!

previous.title: Extra Life 2017
previous.description: Extra Life is a challenge where you livestream for 24 hours to raise money for your local Children Miracle Network hospital. November 10, 2017 was our first time participating in Extra Life, and we were able to beat our original donation goal of $100. Unfortunately, the VOD for the stream has been lost, and there are no good clips.
